docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Skyrim Community Edition (Skyrim CE) is a vanilla+ modding guide for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition on GOG.

docs.title: Goals
docs.text:
The goal of this modding guide is to achieve the following while maintaining the look and feel of vanilla Skyrim:

  • Fix bugs
  • Improve graphical fidelity (meshes, distant terrain and objects)
  • Improve item variety (weapons, armor and clothing)
  • Improve quality of life

docs.title: System requirements
docs.text:
My system specifications at the time of writing:

  • System: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB
  • Storage: SSD

Consider these specifications the recommended system requirements.

docs.title: Detail
docs.text:
• [ ] Reflect Sky
  • Fixes water reflection flicker when moving camera up and down
  • [ ] Lens Flare
  • [ ] Anamorphic Lens Flare

docs.title: Visuals
docs.text: • Far-off Tree Distance: 0 (we'll generate tree object LODs using DynDOLOD instead)

docs.title: Steps
docs.text:
1. Run TexGen with default settings.

    Settings:

    • [x] HD Trees

    Estimated generation time: ~2 minutes.

  2. Run DynDOLOD for all worldspaces with the Medium preset.

    Settings:

    • [x] Ultra Tree LOD

    Estimated generation time: ~15 minutes.

docs.title: Troubleshooting
docs.text:
If you get the following error:

Fatal: Error loading plugin list: <EDirectoryNotFoundException: The specified path was not found

Open regedit, find key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\WOW6432Node\Bethesda Softworks\Skyrim Special Edition and add a new string value Installed Path.

If Skyrim was installed to C:\GOG Games\Skyrim Special Edition, set the value to:

C:\GOG Games\Skyrim Special Edition\

If Skyrim was installed to C:\GOG Games\Skyrim Anniversary Edition, set the value to:

C:\GOG Games\Skyrim Anniversary Edition\

docs.title: Generate terrain LOD
docs.text:
1. Enable the xLODGen Resource - SSE Terrain Tamriel mod.

  2. Run the SSELODGen executable.

  3. Select all worldspaces.

  4. Select Terrain LOD.

  5. Set LOD4 options:

  6. Set LOD8 options:

  7. Set LOD16 options:

  8. Set LOD32 options:

  9. Click Generate.

    LOD generation time: ~30 minutes.

  10. Once LOD generation is complete, close SSELODGen.

  11. Disable the xLODGen Resource - SSE Terrain Tamriel mod.

docs.title: Reset settings
docs.text:
If Skyrim was installed to C:\GOG Games\Skyrim Special Edition, delete the following file:

C:\Users\<USERNAME>\AppData\Local\Skyrim Special Edition GOG\plugins.sseviewsettings

If Skyrim was installed to C:\GOG Games\Skyrim Anniversary Edition, delete the following file:

C:\Users\<USERNAME>\AppData\Local\Skyrim Anniversary Edition GOG\plugins.sseviewsettings

docs.title: Setup Tools
docs.text:
Set the following arguments for:

  • SSELODGen
  • TexGen
  • DynDOLOD

If Skyrim was installed to C:\GOG Games\Skyrim Special Edition:

-sse -m:"C:\Users\<USER_NAME>\Documents\My Games\Skyrim Special Edition GOG\" -p:"C:\Users\<USER_NAME>\AppData\Local\Skyrim Special Edition GOG\plugins.txt" -d:"C:\GOG Games\Skyrim Special Edition\Data\"

If Skyrim was installed to C:\GOG Games\Skyrim Anniversary Edition:

-sse -m:"C:\Users\<USER_NAME>\Documents\My Games\Skyrim Special Edition GOG\" -p:"C:\Users\<USER_NAME>\AppData\Local\Skyrim Anniversary Edition GOG\plugins.txt" -d:"C:\GOG Games\Skyrim Anniversary Edition\Data\"

docs.title: Naked NPCs
docs.text:
Uninstalling or updating armor and clothing mods may cause NPCs may cause them to become naked.

You can attempt to fix this by resetting the inventory of a naked NPC. To do so, open the console, click on the NPC and run the resetinventory command. This is not a guaranteed fix.
